short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to display mint account value in CAD and USD

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Specify the account currency in either CAD or USD, and see your net-worth in either currency with real-time conversion rates!

Click a button while on the Mint account overview page to sync all your accounts, and specify a currency for each individual account. Clicking save will store your preference in browser's local storage and will be used to calculate your true net-worth. 

Toggle between USD and CAD to view your assets, debt, and net-worth in each currency with near real-time conversion rate.
